ai-patthana21.25:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.25:0.3_0: Talking for the sake of constantly,
ai-patthana21.25:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.25:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.25:3.1_1: or the principle for the sake of decrease,
ai-patthana21.25:3.1_2: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.25:3.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
